meanings.definition: (of fish) Migrating from fresh water to spawn in the sea.
meanings.sent1: The catadromous eel travels from the river to the ocean to lay its eggs.
meanings.sent2: The catadromous salmon returns to the ocean to reproduce.
meanings.sent3: The catadromous fish decided to take a vacation in the sea for a change of scenery.
meanings.sent4: Her catadromous journey mirrored her own desire to explore new horizons.
meanings.sent5: The catadromous migration of the fish was a spectacular sight to behold.
